courses.title: Web Development Fundamentals
courses.description: Master the basics of web development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript in this comprehensive beginner's course.

courses.title: Responsive Web Design
courses.description: Learn to create responsive and user-friendly websites that adapt to different devices and screen sizes.

courses.title: Front-End Development Mastery
courses.description: Become an expert in front-end development with advanced techniques in frameworks like React and Vue.js.

courses.title: Back-End Development Essentials
courses.description: Delve into back-end development using Node.js, Express, and databases like MongoDB for powerful server-side solutions.

courses.title: Full-Stack Web Development Bootcamp
courses.description: Become a full-stack developer by mastering both front-end and back-end technologies in this intensive bootcamp.

courses.title: Advanced Web Technologies
courses.description: Explore cutting-edge web technologies such as GraphQL, WebAssembly, and progressive web apps (PWAs) for modern web development.

courses.title: Web Security and Ethical Hacking
courses.description: Learn how to secure web applications and explore ethical hacking techniques to protect against cyber threats.

courses.title: Cloud Computing for Web Developers
courses.description: Discover cloud computing platforms like AWS and Azure to deploy, scale, and manage web applications efficiently.

courses.title: UI/UX Design Principles
courses.description: Learn the principles of user interface (UI) and user experience (UX) design to create engaging and intuitive web interfaces.

courses.title: Web Development Portfolio Workshop
courses.description: Build a professional portfolio showcasing your web development projects and skills to impress potential employers.
